name: Succubus Domination
description:
Succubus Dominance - is a game linking “bullet hell” and “hot succubus”.
Undress, flirt, control. You do not need to shoot at anyone, just dodge and touch the vulnerable places of the succubus.
10 hot succubi, waiting for their master, subdue everyone!
Take everything from a succubus, from a collar to stockings, do not forget to ruin this creature! You need to be acut with them, they are very insidious!

Game Features:
- 10 succubi.
- 10 super tracks.
- More than 7 types of clothes on a succubus.
- "Bullet hell"
